definition: left/the left side/to the left of
suffix of a noun of locality
erhua variant of 左邊|左边[zuo3 bian5]

sentences.english: Does Bruce see him as a left-winger or a central midfielder?
sentences.chinese: 布魯斯會把他當成一個左邊鋒還是中場球員？

sentences.english: A little down? Do you mean move it down to the left?
sentences.chinese: 有點往下？你的意思是說把它往左邊移下一點。

sentences.english: Click on the little eye icon on the left hand side of the ‘Background’ layer so it makes this particular layer invisible.
sentences.chinese: 單擊背景圖層左邊的眼睛圖標，這樣能使它不可見。

sentences.english: Here you should slide the screen area bar to the left.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，您應該幻燈片屏幕面積大律師公會到左邊。

sentences.english: One that is shown on the left is cell transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 左邊顯示的是細胞移植。

sentences.english: There is an electric cooker in the kitchen , The cooker is blue , It is on the left.
sentences.chinese: 廚房裏還有一個電爐子，是藍色的，放在左邊。

sentences.english: Your name badge is placed on your left side, close to your lapel.
sentences.chinese: 顯示名字的胸卡應放在胸前靠左邊的位置。

sentences.english: How else to explain those wacky, way-out-in-left-field roadside attractions you'll stumble upon?
sentences.chinese: 否則怎麼解釋你偶然遇到的出現在路左邊的景點？

sentences.english: Where is the red river valley? It is on the left of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 紅河谷在哪裏？它在那個小山的左邊。

sentences.english: I 'd like my parting move to the left.
sentences.chinese: 我想要把頭路移到左邊。

sentences.english: You can disable this behavior by moving the slider to the left-most position.
sentences.chinese: 你可以移動浮動塊到最左邊的位置來禁止這個特性。

sentences.english: At the left is a temple dedicated to the Roman emperor Hadrian.
sentences.chinese: 左邊是一座紀念古羅馬哈德里安大帝的廟宇。

sentences.english: RECEPTIONIST: The staff room is near the main entrance, on the left over there, just opposite the Reception desk.
sentences.chinese: 研究室在大門旁邊，在那左邊，諮詢處的對面。

sentences.english: Child as ox finds the third child from left.
sentences.chinese: 扮成牛的幼兒找出從左邊數第3個小朋友。

sentences.english: Inom not used to driving cars with their steering wheels inside the right.
sentences.chinese: 我不民風於駕駛方向盤在左邊的汽車。

sentences.english: We'll also make the dark parts of the clouds on the left stronger.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們要把左邊的暗處弄得更暗一些。

definition: (sitting) opposite/across (the street)/directly in front/to be face to face
(of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
above/on top of/on the surface of
